QuestData.Title: The Deadliest of Poisons
QuestData.Description:
You've got the poison. Now it's time to take out that ogre. Gutgruk the Tough.
He usually patrols around their citadel. Probably looking for your expedition as we speak!
Poison your blades, then take that monster down.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Gutgruk is incredibly tough. Use Instant Poison to weaken him!
